projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: A responsive weather application that displays real-time forecasts using an external weather API. Built with React.

projects.title: To-Do App
projects.description: A clean and interactive To-Do list application with full CRUD functionality using React.

projects.title: World Clock App
projects.description: A world clock app showing the current time in multiple cities, built using JavaScript and real-time API integration.

projects.title: Binge Worthy TV Show
projects.description: A TV show tracker that allows users to explore and manage a list of binge-worthy shows. Basic CRUD features included.

projects.title: Guess A Number
projects.description: A fun number guessing game where users try to guess the correct number within a given range.

projects.title: Rock Paper Scissor
projects.description: An interactive Rock, Paper, Scissors game built with vanilla JavaScript and styled with CSS.
